Room.Name: The Void
Room.Description: You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain. You feel synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses. The sky is the same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.

Exit.Description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

Exit.Description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

Room.Name: Road to Newfane
Room.Description: You are on a gently curving north-south road. On your east side a youthful river sparkles blue and rushes in the sunlight. On the west, green leaves and green ferns burst against the rich brown earth. You feel the heat of your healthy muscles as you travel swiftly down the well-paved road. You may recall now if you like.

Exit.Description: You see a village square.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

Room.Name: Newfane Village Square
Room.Description: You are on the lawn of the village square of Newfane, resting against an oak after your vigorous journey. The late spring breeze feels warm and sensuous on your body. An Ale is in progress: you spy more than a dozen fiddlers and hundreds of Morris Dancers dressed in white cotton and wearing colorful hats and bells.

Exit.Description: You see the Road to Newfane.

Room.Name: A Large Dance Hall
Room.Description: You are inside a large dance hall with a very polished, very slippery wooden floor. You see three long lines of dancers, alternating men and women, in some sort of progressive country dance. Two fiddlers, a flautist, and a harpsichord player provide the music. You hear scattered screams of joy from the dancers. You may recall now if you like.

Exit.Description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dancers have been here all night and intend to dance until dawn.

Room.Name: A Small Hall
Room.Description: You are inside a small hall with a rough wooden floor. You see dozens of people in the hall chasing one poor man who is yelling at the top of his lungs. Wait a minute. These people are all holding hands and smiling! The man in front is leading them in a spiral! They're DANCING! And you thought people didn't dance like this any more! You may recall now if you like.

Exit.Description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

Room.Name: Road by a Pond
Room.Description: You are passing by a large pond, almost a small lake. You notice a small wooden shack by the side of the road. You may recall now if you like.

Exit.Description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see a wooden church set back among the trees.

ExtraDescription.Description: The shack looks hand-made by an amateur.

Room.Name: An Old Wooden Church
Room.Description: As you enter the hall, you see the largest crowd of people you've ever seen in your life. They're also the noisiest crowd you've ever heard, and as they press around you, the SWEATIEST crowd you've ever felt! At the front of the hall, a group of musicians are playing 'Chorus Jig'.

Exit.Description: You see a road by a pond.

Room.Name: Mountain Road
Room.Description: You are following a road at the top of a mountain ridge with sky all around you. Distant valleys are spread out below you on both sides. There are many horsemen and horsewomen on this road, riding hell-for-leather out of sheer exhilaration. You wish you had a horse! You may recall now if you like.

Exit.Description: You see several acres of thickly planted, very young Yule Trees.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

Room.Name: Yule Tree Farm
Room.Description: This is the Yule Tree Farm at the top of Mountain Road. All around you, young Yule Trees saturate your senses with dark green needles and pine essence.

Exit.Description: You see a mountain ridge against the sky.

Room.Name: The Void
Room.Description: You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain. You feel synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses. The sky is the same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.

NPC.name: oldstyle keeper
NPC.description: Her job is to set the level for this equipment.
NPC.longDescription: The keeper of the Morris equipment is here.

Item.Name: bells morris leggings
Item.LongDescription: A set of leggings with a dozen brass bells sewn on has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These are a set of sturdy leather leggings with small brass bells sewn on. They look like the leggings worn by Morris dancers. There is a motto tooled into the leather.
'Time on the ground is time wasted.'
This is a fine linen handkerchief used for ritual Morris dances.
This is a fine linen sash used for ritual Morris dances.

Item.Name: staff morris
Item.LongDescription: A short, stout staff made of polished wood is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Made from the wood of a Yule Tree, this staff is about one meter long and highly polished. It looks more like a ritual device than a weapon.
